title: Malz Snow day skin Teleport Gitched
body: When you teleport back to base, his minion and effects are just solid blue.  Been this way since new patch

replies.body:
Hey kaimedar! 

Thanks for the report. We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix.

Thanks!  Also something Else I have noticed over the past 2 days since the new patch has been released, The camera angle has changed when your character is locked on.  I know before when you were on the right side of the maps, it off centered your character more twards the top, but not its opposite.  now the character is locked more twards the ability bar, and its making it dificult to play at times.  Sonething to look into.
they also know about this issue there is another post on it.
oh cool, I didn't see it.  Thanks!
